name: City Crasher DEMO
description:
Made entirely by https://twitter.com/Luca_Cearini

CONTROLS:

A / D = Move Left/Right

SPACEBAR (hold) = Jump / double Jump (Jump higher)
(Landing onto enemy vehicles will destroy them instantly)

MOUSE / MOUSE LEFT = Aim / Shoot

When the game is over, press the "RESTART" button in the pause menu to play again.
